text: Wo ji bu hui dui nimen shuo wo yongyou an la de baozang, wo ye bu zhidao wei jian zhi wu [zhu]; wo ji bu hui [dui nimen] shuo wo shi yi wei tianshi, wo ye bu hui dui nimen suo miaoshi de ren shuo:“An la jue bu hui ci gei tamen renhe caifu”. An la zui zhidao tamen xinzhong de yiqie. Jiaru wo zuole, wo bi cheng liao bu yi zhe.”
